name: model-context-protocol-registry
title: Model Context Protocol Registry
description: Find and install MCP servers in Raycast and other MCP clients like Claude or Cursor.
author: thomas

preferences.name: smitheryApiKey
preferences.title: Smithery API Key
preferences.description: The API key for the Smithery registry (see: https://smithery.ai/account/api-keys)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
